text: te, kotoryye bol'she boyatsya, chem nadeyutsya, chto svoystvenno bogoboyaznennym, kotoryye boyatsya muchitel'noy kary v posledney zhizni, postoyanno molyatsya Allakhu, prosya otvratit' ot nikh nakazaniye ada. Ibo greshniki, kotoryye podvergnutsya muchitel'noy kare ada, budut vechno prebyvat' v etoy muke
